summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, the preparation and submission of evidence and the employment of all expert assistance necessary or convenient in the case of William Cramp & Sons Ship & Engine Building Company, and Lewis F. Moody, Plaintiffs, vs. The City of Seattle, Defendent, now pending in the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, Northern Division, and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor, and declaring an emergency.
